title: Natural Aroma Chemicals - Global Sourcing Experts
description: C&A manufactures natural aroma chemicals such as natural citral, natural geraniol, natural geranyl acetate, and natural linalool.
cleaned_text: In addition to manufacturing synthetic aroma chemicals, Citrus & Allied (C&A) manufactures natural aroma chemicals for companies looking for strictly natural materials. At our fully integrated facility, C&A isolates natural aroma chemicals such as natural citral, natural geraniol, natural geranyl acetate, and natural linalool from essential oils. We manufacture natural aroma chemicals under strict quality assurance processes. We are a trusted source for natural aroma chemicals and comply with industry guidelines and governing authorities to ensure the quality and safety of our products.
